message.content:
cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.CE, cs.NI, cs.Distributed Systems. 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the design of a resource broker for Grids, which involves managing and coordinating resources across multiple organizations. This aligns with the Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC) sub-category. The paper also discusses the challenges of application composition and deployment, which falls under the Software Engineering (cs.SE) sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses the unique requirements of the Grid infrastructure, which aligns with the Computer Engineering (cs.CE) sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of networks and communication protocols, which aligns with the Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the evaluation of the broker with different middleware, which aligns with the Distributed Systems (cs.Distributed Systems) sub-category.
